events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on the highway, resulting in damage to the front bumper and airbags deploying.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident due to keywords indicating car collision and vehicle damage details.
An insurance claims agent has been assigned to handle the customer's case and will reach out shortly to gather more details.
The customer received a formal acknowledgment email confirming receipt and registration of the auto accident claim.
The customer was requested to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates as supporting documents.
All requested documents including photos, police report, and mechanic's estimate have been uploaded successfully by the customer.
The claims investigation team has started reviewing the submitted documents and contacted third parties for additional witness statements.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was solely due to another vehicle's negligence causing the collision.
A settlement amount has been proposed to the customer covering all damages including vehicle repairs and towing expenses.
Customer responded expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement offer and appreciated the efficient claims processing.
The claim has been officially approved by management following the customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account, covering all agreed amounts promptly.
The auto accident insurance claim has been marked closed following successful payment and customer confirmation of claim resolution.
All documents and records related to the auto accident claim have been archived in the system for future reference.
